story.description: This is a long description about how this adventure is crazy funny! PS: It's also a test story, so you can see what this app supports in story telling!

1001.partDesc: This is the main text describing the story you are on, and just giving you one option to get to next tag. Telling it where it is, or a riddle
1001.choiceDesc: There is only one choice here, and it's a riddle to get to the next tag. Enjoy!

Show me how to get to the next tag.optHintText: Do you know where I can get a coffee at a reasonable price? That's where the next tag is ;)

Apple.optHintText: Do you know where this image is taken?

Orange.optHintText: Listen to the text and tell me who you are

1003.partDesc: You are in a beautiful forest...

Take a look.optHintText: Do you know where this rock is?

1004.choiceDesc: Play a song on the rock

Follow me.optHintText: Just follow the arrow and you will find the treasure (with optional length to the treasure)

1007.partDesc: You are done! Thank you for experiencing my story! Hope you enjoyed it.
